resources.string: This is the Main Menu. On this page, the user will be able to click a button of their choice upon which an explicit intent is triggered to the correct screen.\n\nThe user will be able to navigate from one screen to another on scrollable page menu, not just from Main Menu.

When the user clicks on Now Playing button in the Main Menu, the activity will open via an explicit intent and the song will start playing. 

The artist name, image, and song title will change automatically, and the media player will be at the bottom of the screen.

To make the music playback work the MediaPlayer and AudioManager classes have to be instantiated.

When the playback of a track is ended, the next one from the tracklist must be started. setOnCompletionListener()/setNextMediaPlayer() should take care of that. 

The next and previous buttons stop the current track playback and starts the previous/next track. The setNextMediaPlayer() should also be a solution for this. When the MusicPlayer starts it receives parameters from its caller activity. Using those parameters, a playlist is generated in an array of object variable. During playback and the next/previous play that array is used.

When you open the app list with all your playlist appears below. Tapping on one of them, starts the Now Playing section with parameters of playlist.\n\nIf you don\'t have any play list, a message will appear telling you to add songs by tapping the fab + button. When you do so, a new activity opens to add songs. In this new activity you can scan your device for media files, or you can visit various online music stores to by new songs.

When you open the Albums list with all your albums appears below. Tapping on one of them, starts the Now Playing section with parameters of album.\n\nIf you don\'t have any album on the list, a message will appear telling you to add albums by tapping the fab + button. When you do so, a new activity opens to add albums. In this new activity you can scan your device for media files, or you can visit various online music stores to by new albums.

When you open the Songs list with all your songs appears below. Tapping on one of them, starts the Now Playing section with parameters of song.\n\nIf you don\'t have any songs on the list, a message will appear telling you to add albums by tapping the fab + button. When you do so, a new activity opens to add songs. In this new activity you can scan your device for media files, or you can visit various online music stores to by new songs.
When you open the Artist list with all artits appears below from your songs and albums.\n\n If you don\'t have any artist on the list, you did not add any album or song to the music appilcation.
